content: Enjoy a heart pounding performance every time you dry your clothes by placing the trapeze family clothing pins on the line. The amazing Pegzini family has come in their best attire and are ready to perform their death-defying stunts as your clothes dry.

The virtually indestructible pet ball is the last toy you’ll every have to buy your over energized and destructive doggy. The ball is made from a hard non-toxic polyethylene plastic designed to stand up to old Rex’s sharp and relentless canines.

Encourage your pet’s bad habits by having them drink from the toilet bowl pet drinking fountain. Simply place any two liter bottle onto the back of the tank and gravity pulls it into the small toilet bowl at the base so Sparky can stay well hydrated while you have a laugh.

Conquer any type of terrain you have to dig through with this handy collapsible shovel. This ultra versatile shovel features a plethora of tools incorporated into its design such as a serrated edge and a pick to help you break through anything.

Ensure your weapons remain in perfect condition by utilizing the military maintenance tool to keep them performing in tip top shape. Made of stainless steel, it comes with everything needed to perform regular upkeep and folds into a compact unit after use.

Avoid splashing and spilling the contents of your kitchen pots all over the counter by pouring it using the slip-on silicone spout. This heat resistant spout comes in a slew of vibrant colors and attaches to a variety of mixing bowls, jars, pots, or pans.

Blow bystanders away by complementing your outfit with the nude gun tights. These NRA approved tights feature intricate and realistic looking designs that create the illusion you’ve tattooed an arsenal of firearms all over your stems.

Something’s cooking in the kitchen and it’s deliciously adorable. The baby lobster costume is a two piece ensemble that’ll transform your tiny tot into an impossibly cute sea critter ideal for complementing your chef costume.

titleEN: Reasons To Panic About Getting Married
content: Fact: weddings are scary. The happiest day of your life is also the most nerve racking. This book highlights all of the many things that can go wrong – rationalizing your fear and doubt of the most important decision you’ll ever make while providing reassuring advice.

Ensure the inside of your vehicle stays tidy by keeping your belongings neatly organized on the car headrest hangers. They attach directly on the headrest and provide you with four hooks ideal for hanging bags, purses, and bookbags.

Combat the bitter cold winter weather both internally and externally by bundling up with the scarf flask. Available in a variety of styles and colors, this fashionable garment comes with a concealed eight ounce flask you can discreetly sip from anytime.

Take your credit-card sized PC to the next level by upgrading it using the Raspberry Pi touchscreen. You’ll be able to accomplish various tasks by easily navigating the 2.8 inch display with 320×240 16-bit color pixels and resistive touch overlay.

Create a chic environment at your next get together by serving up drinks in these light up glasses. Each of these highball glasses hold up to 16 ounces and emits a bright and colorful light from the bottom that lights up the entire glass giving it an incredible effect.

Ladies, prepare to enter a fantasy world where men listen to your issues, prepare delicious home-cooked meals, and clean the house when you dig into the pages of the “Porn for Women” book. It portrays the opposite sex just as you’d always imagined.

Take flight anytime and anywhere you want no matter how cramped your surroundings, with the remote control mini drone. This pint sized drone features 3 levels of adjustable speed and can easily maneuver in small spaces making it ideal for indoor use.

Ensure your dreams are extra sweet by going to sleep cuddled next to these sweet treat pillows. Each ultra soft pillow comes filled with microbeads that move with you and feature a mouth-watering design  that’ll appeal to anyone with a sweet tooth.

Disconnect from the world around you by immersing yourself in your favorite show or movie while watching it with the 3D video glasses. These Bluetooth enabled glasses work right out of the box and allow you to watch TV or movies in either 2D or 3D virtually anywhere.

Cry yourself to sleep in loving embrace of the full body pillow. It provides your tired back and legs with the physical support you need while providing your shattered heart with the emotional support it craves until Mr. Right comes along.

Put your coloring skills to the test by trying to complete a page from the intricate illustrations coloring book. Each page comes chock-full of impossibly convoluted designs that’ll make coloring inside the lines into a Herculean task.

Knock your pure bred pooch a few notches down the pedigree ladder with this low class dog mullet wig. With six inches of luscious brown curls in the back and a stylish tri-colored headband to tie the look together – he’ll be all business in the front and party in the back.

titleEN: The Neighbors Have Better Stuff Mat
content: Keep your precious belongings safe from burglars by leading them next door using “The Neighbors Have Better Stuff” mat. The grass really is greener on the other side – so let burglars know it by encouraging them to rob the Joneses instead!

Stay inebriated while on the go without arousing suspicion by carrying around the wine dispensing purse. Fueling your crippling alcohol addiction, the purse allows you to store and serve wine wherever you are – so you never have to be sober again!

Play all favorite smartphone games the way they were meant to be played with the Bluetooth NES gaming controller. The iconic controller is back and better than ever as it seamlessly combines vintage controls with today’s modern handheld devices.

Keep the remote from disappearing into the cushiony abyss by storing it in the couch organizer. Crafted from solid wood, this handy device fits perfectly on the couch’s armrest to provide a small but spacious storing compartment.

Keep your electronic devices juiced up whilst in the great outdoors with the high capacity solar panel charger. This compact device is built to withstand Mother Nature’s unforgiving weather conditions while providing a reliable backup source of power.

Keep your infant – and the rest of the plane – happy while in the air by laying him down on the airplane baby seat. This FAA compliant seat utilizes the space in between yourself and the seat in front of you to create a little hammock bed for junior.

Experience a new kind of buzz from your favorite herb by chugging down a cannabis energy drink. This 100% legal beverage is complemented with hemp seed extract and made with enough caffeine and sugar to have you feeling anything but dazed and confused.

Ensure you seal the deal by creating a magical star-lit night with the Cupid starry light projector. With a flick of the switch your plain room gets transformed into a love palace – complete with a heart shaped centerpiece featuring Cupid with his trusty bow and arrow.

Unlock your smartphone’s true potential by keeping all the info you need at a glance using the second screen iPhone case. This ultra low power attachment is always on and completely customizable so you can take pics and display them with a swipe of the finger.

Get ready to combat the day ahead of you by energizing yourself with your favorite caffeinated beverage served out of the ninja mug. It features a removable hood koozie, a built-in ninja star coaster, and a deadly stirring sword.

Ensure your savory stew stays piping hot until the moment you serve it by placing it inside the insulated non-electric slow cooker. This eco-friendly way of cooking will keep your signature dish slowly stewing for up to 12 hours without electricity.

Brace yourselves – your favorite Game Of Thrones characters are coming to a LEGO Ville near you! Ideal for the ultimate GoT fan, these mini LEGO figurines come expertly detailed to resemble all the main characters of the series as closely as possible.

Turn a rather unpleasant task into an adrenaline pumping adventure by pulling the trigger of the shotgun toilet plunger. Providing the functionality of a traditional plunger with the thrill of redneck shenanigans – it will violently blast any clog out from your toilet.

There’s no excuse for eating like a savage when venturing into the great outdoors when you bring along these interlocking portable eating utensils. Whether you need a spoon, fork, or knife, this ultra compact package has it all.

titleEN: Travel The World On 50 Dollars A Day
content: Experience everything our marvelous planet has to offer without decimating your bank account by following the helpful tips inside the “How To Travel The World On $50 A Day” book. You’ll learn how to stretch your budget so you can travel cheaper and smarter.

Avoid sticky messes all over the kitchen by having the kids and elderly folk serve their drinks using the drink pouring aide. This ultra useful device allows you to serve a heavy gallon size plastic bottle effortlessly with a single finger without spilling a drop.

Re-live all the excitement and anguish of watching your favorite on-screen personalities go through their most embarrassing moments as you flip through the pop-up book of celebrity meltdowns — featuring Michael Jackson, Tom Cruise, Paris Hilton, and many more.

Keep your drinks icy cool in the most arid environments you venture into by bringing along the portable backpack cooler. This high performance 20-liter leak-proof cooler keeps ice intact for over 24 hours and features a padded back strap for easy carrying.

Get your electronic devices up and running when you need them the most by using this solar powered generator. No matter where you are, you’ll be able to power your electronic devices and quickly refuel the generator through either a wall outlet or sunlight.

Bring a small piece of Japan’s lush gardens to your home by protecting your smartphone with this grass iPhone cover. The case slips snuggly over your phone and covers it with a bright green surface modeled after the soft grass seen in Tokyo’s Yoyogi park.

Create vivid and colorful works of art without creating a cloud of dust when using these chalk markers. Unlike traditional markers, these utilize a specialized liquid that won’t run or drip and can easily be cleaned up with a damp cloth once it’s time to erase.

Venture off the beaten path without fear of getting lost by equipping your bike with the touchscreen bicycle GPS. Once safely mounted onto your bike, it provides you with an easy to read map on the glove-friendly touchscreen.

Rid yourself of those pesky arm hairs around your wrist when you begin rocking the lighter watch. This fully functional and flashy timepiece incorporates a useful butane lighter into the watch’s face so you always have a light when you need it.

Vanquish unpleasant weather with a mighty swing of your trusty gothic bastard sword umbrella. The handle is shaped like a medieval sword hilt with metallic finish and leather grip that prop up a massive 41″ diameter umbrella ideal for keeping you dry and slaying orcs.

Create an enchanting nighttime ambiance without adding to your electric bill with these solar powered string lights. The design of these hand blown lights combines the beauty of glow in the dark crystals with solar power to produce astonishing effects.

titleEN: Doctor Who TARDIS Knee High Socks
content: Give your outfit a fashionable timey-wimey spin with these stylish Doctor Who TARDIS knee high socks. The Doctor’s iconic blue time travelling TARDIS is depicted along the side in addition to featuring a nifty “Doctor Who” logo on the bottom.

Celebrate the special bond you share with your ride or die squad by cementing it with this classy “Best Bitches” pedant. This silver colored pendant breaks away into three pieces that spell out “Best Bitches” when they’re joined together.

Give your look an eye-raising factor as you complete your outfit with these bowtie nude tights. These sultry transparent tights come monogrammed with a playful bow on each leg that make it appear as if you’ve gotten them inked on your skin.

Tony’s making a pit stop by your desk to relieve you of your boredom with the Iron Man floating action figure. This tiny Iron Man utilizes electromagnetic attraction and repulsion to create a hovering effect so that the Mark II appears to be flying!

Learn the real story of our nation’s unique brand of hooch within the pages of the “Cultural History Of Moonshine” book. You’ll go on an in depth journey through its tumultuous past, from the very first batches to the potent white lightning we know and love today.

Insert a dash of color and life to your diet by growing some of these vibrant rainbow colored carrots. Using these rainbow carrot seeds, you’ll be able to cultivate a multicolored garden with orange, red, white, purple, and red carrots.

Whether the aim is to fend off things that go bump in the night or a would-be assaulter, the tactical self defense flashlight is the tool for the job. Apart from shining a bright beam of 2000 lumens, the head comes lined with spikes ideal for inflicting pain.

Fill your evening with magic and whimsy as you illuminate the night sky with these fun to use sky lanterns. Perfect for any celebration, these flame retardant and 100% biodegradable lanterns create a beautiful effect as they take to the air.

Make lunchtime fun for the little ones by transforming their meals using the teddy bear sandwich mold. Ideal for fussy eaters, the mold allows you to turn any slice of bread into an adorable little 3D teddy bear that keeps them company as they chow down.

Avoid becoming stranded the next time your car dies on you by carrying around the portable jump starter. When your car’s battery craps out on you and there’s no one around to give you a jump, this handy device will come to the rescue.

The Minions have switched over to the good side and are here to help your young ones with these novelty LED Minion nightlights. Each nighlight is shaped like a kooky and adorable Minion that emits a relaxing glow ideal for falling asleep to.

Show your unruly yard who’s boss as you chop, cut and saw your way through every overgrown tree and shrub. This versatile tool allows you to easily cut through branches up to four inches wide while limiting potentially dangerous kickbacks.

Enjoy a piping hot gourmet meal at the office by packing your chow in the USB heated lunch box. While everyone else crowds around the microwave, you can simply plug in your lunchbox and enjoy a warm home cooked meal anytime you want.

Increase your chances of victory on the paintball and airsoft battlefield by confusing the enemy using these colorful smoke grenades. Once activated, the grenades fill the air with a dense cloud of colored smoke that releases for about ninety seconds.

Treat unsuspecting bystanders to an epic set as you drop the beat on them using the portable digital turntable. This pocket sized device features two dual touchscreens that place an entire recording studio at your fingertips so you can record anytime, anywhere.

Keep the alcohol flowing all night long – or until your liver fails you – by popping open your brews with the beer mug bottle opener. When the mug is empty, you simply flip it over and pop open another fresh brew using the functional bottle opener on the bottom.

Show off your gamer roots every time you pull out the Sony Playstation wallet to make a purchase. This officially licensed wallet – made from durable PVC and polyester – features a first generation Playstation design that all gamers will love.

Let a bad bitch know just how much you love dat badunkadunk with a tender message from the holla teddy bear. This super cuddly teddy features a lovable smile and a small monogrammed heart that lets that special someone know that you tryna holla though.

Keep your beverage at the ideal drinking temperature without watering it down by using the whiskey rocks ice cubes. These everlasting ice cubes work exactly like ice, except they never melt – after each use you simply wash them and freeze them again.

Stop feeling claustrophobic the next time you go to bathe by giving yourself extra room using the shower curtain space extender. This ingenious device curves the curtain so that you get up to 50% more space to move around in, allowing you to shower in total comfort.

Upgrade your favorite pair of gloves to be touchscreen friendly with the touchscreen gloves converter tips. Instead of having to settle for fugly specialized gloves you’ll be able to still wear your stylish pair and be able to have full access to your phone’s screen.

Avoid making a mess next time you work on your car or bike by employing the services of the form flexing funnel. This unique funnel molds and holds to whatever shape you desire in order to create a leak proof channel ideal for draining oil and other fluids.

Sit back and drink like there’s no tomorrow because you’ve got the ultimate hangover cure by your side. While homemade “cures” taste like manure and yield no results, this solution contains up to 3 times the electrolytes of sports drinks so you can recover faster.

No one can hide from the lens of the smartphone thermal imaging camera. Once mounted on your smartphone, this 384×288 pixel resolution camera is capable of detecting a human being up to 1600 feet away in total darkness.

Stop wasting your time trying to open jars with those puny noodles you call arms – because now you can employ the services of the automatic jar opener and easily pop up the top of your favorite foods while weeping over your diminutive physique.

Turn your next party into the most far-out celebration your town has ever seen using the party light ball. With the flick of a switch the room goes from lame to groovy as it is illuminated by a plethora of rotating multicolored lights. Groovy.

Feed your crippling nicotine addiction without exposing your fingers to the harsh winter elements by using these smoking mittens. They keep your fingers warm while a built in grometted hole allows you to hold your cigarette without having to take off your gloves.

Two of mankind’s greatest foods have finally joined forces to improve the movie-watching experience. Every gluttonous kernel of the bacon flavored microwave popcorn comes bathed with an intoxicating aroma that’ll make anyone salivate.

Keep yourself alert and hydrated like a true gamer as you journey throughout the bowels of Azeroth by consuming the mana energy drink. Packed with more caffeine than two Redbulls, it provides hours of jitter-free energy with no after-crash.

Examine the intricacies of the most important human body part by accentuating your room or office with the cardboard paper skull. This easy to assemble skull is made from recycled cardboard and portrays a detailed image of the human skull in all its glory.

Podcast anywhere, anytime and keep your enormous fanbase of three listeners satisfied by using the mini iOS microphone. Designed for both smartphones and tablets, this compact mic delivers outstanding sound quality for your lucrative podcasting career.

titleEN: Art Of Eating Through The Apocalypse
content: Staying alive will be difficult after the zombies destroy society – luckily the “Art of Eating Through The Apocalypse” book gives you a fighting chance.  After the supermarkets have been depleted, this helpful guide will teach you how to improvise your own meals.

Keep your body warm and your liver working overtime as the temperature drops by wearing the flask mittens. Apart from warming your hands, these mittens conceal a small flask with a cap and funnel that enable you to drink without having to expose your hands to the cold.

Share the thrill of going full speed down a hill with your buddies by riding on the connecting saucer sled. This extremely fun accident waiting to happen comes with a slick vinyl bottom and special connection points that allow you to attach as many saucers as you desire.

Power up your kitchen with this geeky refrigerator Game Boy Tetris decal. No matter what the color of your fridge, these easy to install decals transform the plain facade into a lively and nostalgic tribute any gamer can appreciate.

Transform yourself into your favorite X-Man without dealing with the hassle of experimental surgeries when you acquire these Wolverine style claws. These incredibly sharp claws fit snuggly in between your fingers to create a lifelike appearance, Bub.

Maximize your truck’s practicality by keeping all your belongings stashed away within this truck bed organizer. Once installed, you’ll have two bed-length drawers and four ammo cans at your disposal so that all your gear remains neatly arranged.

Start your day off right by dousing yourself in delicious blood by bathing using the blood bath shower gel. Apart from satiating your inner haemophile, it features a delightful cherry scent and comes in a lovely human blood transfusion-like bag.

Add a challenging twist to your favorite drinking game by turning your head into a moving target when playing beer pong. This inflatable beer pong hat allows you to play anytime, anywhere without needing a bulky table. It also doubles as an excellent college graduation cap.

Climb trees and infiltrate headquarters with the agility of a ninja by wearing the hand claw spikes. Once the adjustable nylon straps are wrapped around your hands, the razor sharp and heavy duty steel claws will provide a superb grip as you climb.

You won’t find better lighting for a thrilling night of poor decision making than the soft glow emitted from the always classy red party cup string lights. Each set provides great ambient lighting while being the perfect party accessory for any keg party.

Not even the ultimate roadie can tune an axe better or quicker than the automatic guitar tuner. By placing this high-tech tuner over the guitar’s tuning peg and strumming any string, this battery operated device physically fine tunes your guitar in a matter of seconds.

titleEN: Cocktails With A Literary Twist Book
content: Barflies and bookworms alike will get a kick – and a strong buzz – after perusing the “Cocktails With A Literary Twist” book. No matter what poison you decide to drown your liver in, you’ll find a pun-tastic recipe to match, such as “The Rye in the Catcher” or “Gin Eyre”.

Fear not citizens of LEGOVille – for the LEGO Ghostbusters are here to exterminate your local ghouls with help from their trusty automobile. The Ecto-1 features the classic logo and comes decked out with the latest in paranormal detection equipment.

May the toast be with you as you sit down to enjoy a well balanced breakfast courtesy of the Darth Vader toaster helmet. Shaped like Vader’s iconic helmet, the toaster brands each slice of bread with the famous Star Wars logo on each side.

Keep your hands clean and your eyes on the game as you munch out on your buttery cob using the football shaped corn holders. Equipped with two small stainless steel rods ideal for piercing your corn, it’s the perfect utensil for any tailgate.

Face it – you have the personality of a rock. If you want to leave your mark – and not just a blemish – on people you need to stand out. This uniquely inspirational how-to combines fresh and pithy lessons with deceptively simple diagrams and charts.

Solve the problem of overcrowded wall plugs once and for all with the four port USB wall charger. This compact device maximizes your wall outlets to the fullest by providing you with up to four USB ports so you can charge all your electronic devices at once!

Generate environmentally friendly power while receiving a killer leg workout with the pedal power generator. This ultra portable device features bike pedals that make it easy to use while generating enough power to charge all your devices.

In the event of an accident, a hit and run, or if you just happen to live in Russia, the windshield video recorder is a must have device. This small windshield mounted camera captures everything in full 1080p so you have an accurate account of what really went down.

Your loyal robotic butler is never far behind you once the world’s first balancing robot enters your life. It communicates through a combinations of lights, motions, and sounds and will follow you all around the house thanks to its dual balancing wheels.

You’re a strong independent man who never asks for directions – but are you a skilled expert in bear fighting, business negotiations, erotic foreplay, and other must have skills? If not – you need to read the “Man Up” book which contains 367 skills for the modern man.

Give everyone that passes through a warm friendly greeting with the middle finger snowglobe. Great for use throughout the entire year, just a few shakes fills the globe in a flurry of brightly colored glitter for a festive way of telling others to fuck off.

Go commando at your next formal event with this uberly stylish camouflage suite. With its stunning classic military mosaic emblazoned around the entire suit, this polyester beauty will blend into any type of environment whether it’s a bachelor party or a first communion.

Keep your mane looking as glorious and thick as ever by sprinkling some beard oil into your manly whiskers. Made from all natural ingredients, this special oil contains a delightful woodsy scent and is designed to give your beard and mustache a brilliant luster.
